name: Boxy see, Boxy do
description:
The aim of each level is to interact with the large purple capsule. Each character has their own personality, and while you can ask them to do something, they may refuse, or get distracted and do something else entirely. Once you hit go, it’s up to the characters to decide, it’s out of your hands. 

Think about their personalities before asking them to do things, and perhaps their interests will align with yours.

The Athlete

Spent so long training his body, but not enough time training his mind. Very easily distracted, if he can see a button, he will press it.

The Herb Enthusiast

He’ll tell you that his interests are strictly medicinal, but he’s not particularly convincing. Has an antisocial habit of filling the air with smoke so thick you can’t see anything.

The Vegan

Will eat pretty much any kind of plant, but refuses to hurt animals. Unfortunately, this does not stop the animals from hurting her.

The Psychopath

Sometimes what you need to solve your problems is a blunt object. And sometimes you need a gun and an empathy disorder. Polly won’t be much use in doing what you ask, unless what you’re asking is killing.

Controls
  • Move: Click
  • Interact: Click
  • Back to Menu : M

First you need to click a portrait to select a character, and then click on an object to request they interact with it.

If everything hangs and won't let you input again, press Q to break out of it.
